title: Introduction to the Course
description: An overview of what the course will cover and how to navigate the materials.

title: Setting Up Your Environment
description: Learn how to install the necessary tools and configure your development environment.

title: Understanding the Basics
description: Cover fundamental concepts like syntax, variables, and basic operations.

title: Working with Variables and Data Types
description: Dive deeper into variable types, type casting, and data storage in memory.

title: Control Flow and Functions
description: Learn how to use if statements, loops, and define reusable functions.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Understand classes, objects, inheritance, and encapsulation.

title: Working with APIs
description: Introduction to APIs and how to fetch and process data from external services.

title: Building a Mini Project
description: Put your skills together to build a small, functional application.

title: Final Assessment and Review
description: Test your knowledge with a final assessment and go over key concepts.
